ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Umm, all of the rest, but watch out for what Arrow, Blender, and Srronghold say, they aren t very normal. Stranato said. My turn! Train Wreck said. Very

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

"Umm, all of the rest, but watch out for what Arrow, Blender, and Srronghol=
d say, they aren't very normal." Stranato said.

"My turn!" Train Wreck sai=
d. Very slowly, at a very slow pace, Train Wreck told Infectra alot about c=
omputers, that is too complicated to post here, he also told her about how =
the computers can do spark scans to find nearby bots...
  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Fri=
day, June 30, 2000 5:39 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Infectra: Soun=
ds interesting. I got that. I have good memory...I hope! *Infectra said jok=
ing* Infectra: Who else is going to teach me something?
    ----- Original =
Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Fri=
day, June 30, 2000 5:33 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Okay, firs=
t it's Stranato's turn, he'll show you combat and stuff." Train Wreck said.=
 The others nodded and walked back into the base. Stranato turned to Infect=
ra.

    "So, first of all, if someone fires at you, use something for ptot=
ection, you can grab a rock or something, because around here, lots of powe=
rful weapons are used, stay away from Heavy Blaster Rifles if your not the =
one holding them! Okay, watch this." Stranato said. He propped a dummy up o=
n his back. He swung his foot backwards and kicked the dummy in the groin. =
Stranato then hit a belly to belly suplex on the dummy.

    "Now, if somet=
hing happens, like you getting into a bunch of trouble, play dead, they com=
e close, bam! You blow their guts out!" Stranato said. Stranato fired his e=
ye beams into the sky. Stranato did a moonsault from the top of a rock.

  =
  "Never forget to surprise your opponent!" Stranato said.

    "Oh, yeah, =
don't argue with the leaders, they get mad, and all the bases have autoguns=
 and shields, watch out for them." Stranato said. Stranato hopped onto a ro=
ck.

    "Pick your weapons carefully, and never let your guard down, your =
best friends could be your enemy!" Stranato said.

    "Protect the Ark, ye=
ah, I know, we don't fight for any reasons but our own, but if the Autobots=
 get destroyed, you cease to exist! Oh, yeah, kick ass and win Olympic Gold=
!" Stranato said. Stranato nodded and laughed...
      ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 5:21 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


   =
   *Infectra stands up and follows the Radicons* Infectra: I want you to sh=
ow everything importent. Every detail please. *Infectra says to the Radicon=
s*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 4:39 AM
        Su=
bject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        "Okay, Airbomber will teach you about s=
ome stuff first." Train Wreck said.

        "Okay, we are on the planet Ea=
rth, we are with the Maximlas, and we are trying to destroy the Predacons a=
nd Alliance, but however, right now we are at truce, so our enemies are the=
 Newcomers right now." Airbomber said.

        "Yeah, Airbomber got it rig=
ht, stupid truce. Well, anyway, to be successful in the Neo Beast Wars, you=
 have to know the fine arts, come outside and let us show you." Stranato sa=
id. The Radicons walked out the door, motioning for Infectra to come along.=
..
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards =

          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 4:=
09 AM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Infectra looked at=
 them all* Infectra: What's so horrid about this place? You must teach me, =
please. *Infectra sits up and looks at them waiting for some tips*
        =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:17 PM
  =
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            Train Wreck looks at he=
r.

            "Amnesia? Well, it sounds to me like when we got out spark =
shipment from our deathmatches, somebody ripped out your spark and snuck it=
 in, somebody must have hated you alot, but don't worry, yuor safe with us =
now." Train Wreck said.

            "Be careful, I tried to kill a guy." S=
tranato said.

            "Stranato, don't worry about it!" Airbomber said=
.

            "It seems you don't know about the war, you were peaceful on=
 Cybertron, so lets teach you what to do to stay alive on this horrid plane=
t." Train Wreck said.

            "Yeah, first of all, ya gotta drink this=
 stuff!" Stronghold said to Infectra, taking a big gulp of beer.

         =
   "Yeah, and you smoke these!" Blender said, smoking a cigar. Train Wreck =
walked up and slapped them both in the back of the head.

            "I ca=
n help, I love to help!" Airbomber said. Arrow walks over and smokes a ciga=
r, blowing some smoke in Infectra's face. Train Wreck comes up behind Arrow=
 and taps his shoulder. Arrow turns around and Train Wreck slaps him in the=
 face.

            "Please excuse those 3 ignoramuses, they don't know any=
 better." Train Wreck said to Infectra...
              ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:05 PM
           =
   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              *The Bots optics open and sh=
e looks around* Infectra:...where am I????.......the last thing I remember =
I was seeing my friedns go plunging to the floor and then this large bot se=
nds this claw out at me....but......that's all I remember..... *She says to=
 particular bot*
                ----- Original Message ----- 
            =
    From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                =
Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:50 PM
                Subject: Re: Neo Bea=
st Wars


                OCC: I talked to Orchid and she said she wanted a=
 new character to be made from Drazom, but she didn't want it to be anythin=
g like Drazom.
                 
                Train Wreck works on Drazo=
m. He looks at all of the sparks they had in storage.

                "Now=
 how did this one get in here? This spark was never in a deathmatch!" Train=
 Wreck said.

                "So how did it get in there?" Stranato asked.=
 Train Wreck shrugged. He took the spark, curious to find out who it is, he=
 put it in the former body of Drazom, which was remade into whatever Orchid=
 wants it to be, whatever, it looks nothing like Drazom. Train Wreck and th=
e rest of the Radicons wait for the robot to come to life...
              =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
=
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday,=
 June 29, 2000 10:21 PM
                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


   =
               (OOC: I want to bring in a new character. I already have an =
idea..)
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                 =
   From: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
             =
       Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 9:08 PM
                    Subject: R=
e: Neo Beast Wars


                    Stranato was confused now, this bot=
 seemed to die sad. First he wanted to die, he should have been happy, but =
he seemed so sad to die, the knife had no affect, he froze to death. Strana=
to sighed, this was the part of his job he hated. Stranato picked up Drazom=
's body and carried it back to the Radicon's wrecked ship, which served as =
their base. Stranato set Drazom's body on a table.

                    "An=
y way we can bring him back? We can reprogram him to serve us." Stranato sa=
id.

                    "I don't think so, his spark looks to be extinguis=
hed, sorry poor fellow, we couldn't save ya." Train Wreck said.

          =
          "I shouldn't have stabbed him." Stranato said.

                 =
   "It wasn't you who killed him, he froze to death, just sorry he didn't m=
ake it." Train Wreck said.

                    "No, you don't understand, =
I tried to kill him, I'm no better than the cold! I don't understand why I =
did something like that, maybe it was the cold." Stranato said. He sighed.
=

                    "Maybe I'm just a son of a--"

                    "No=
, you are acting stupid now! Your murderer curcuits blocked out your intell=
igence circuits and your logic circuits." Train Wreck said, interupting Str=
anato.

                    "I hope your right." Stranato said. Train Wreck=
 looked at the body.

                    "We could always put a new spark =
in his body" Train Wreck said. Stranato sighed and sat in the corner.

    =
                "We could have used him, and instead we let him die and did=
n't save him, and I tried to kill him myself." Stranato said.

            =
        OCC: Orchid, the Radicons could put a new spark from their spark co=
llection (From deathmatches!) into Drazom's body if you want to have a new =
character with Drazoms body, Orchid. Orchid, I could have them change the b=
ody and you can bring in a new character without having him or her look lik=
e Drazom at all, your choice, you can just have them get rid of his body ev=
en, just pick something, please...
                      ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
                      From: ilovealllizards 
                  =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Thursday, June 29, =
2000 8:37 PM
                      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          =
            *The knife hit Drazom's back. He didn't scream or anything. It =
was already snowing which made him even colder. Mech fluid begins pouring o=
ut of his back* Drazom:............ *Drazom's head hits the ground. It wasn=
't really the knife. It was coldness. Drazom's spark fades out and he lies =
there......and mutters one word..* Drazom:....Mantella....... *Drazom's opt=
ics flicker and fade out* *He lived to love....he lived to die.....That was=
 a queston that would never be answered*





                      (OOC: P=
lease Drazom on the Deceased bots page. as that he died from the lack of em=
ch fluid and because of how cold it was)
                        ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
                        From: THECODE 
                =
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Thursday, Jun=
e 29, 2000 6:54 PM
                        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
                      The Radicons had walked off and left Drazom, but now =
they were walking back and they seen him again. Airbomber laughed.

       =
                 "There's the guy I saved, I wonder why he wants to die?" A=
irbomber asked.

                        "I don't know, but I will oblige h=
is needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up behind Drazom slowly. Stranato=
 pulled out a knife, something he had stolen from the People's Base, and pl=
unged it down, the knife screaming toward Drazom's back.

                 =
       Stronghold and Blender took a sip of their beer.

                  =
      "Why does that guy want to die, though?" Arrow asked.

              =
          "Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radicons watching =
Stranato...
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
                   From: ilovealllizards 
                          To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 7=
:01 PM
                          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            =
              *Drazom slowly turns his head and looks at The Radicons* Draz=
om:....no......I must...die for.....my stupidity...of....messing up with...=
...Mantella..... *Drazom's optics widen as he remembers something* Drazom:.=
..hey....I'm a Pred.....I AM!.....kill me........*Drazom pulls hisself up b=
y a tree limb and mech fluid pours out of his side and he falls back to the=
 ground shivering from how cold it is getting from the lack of mech fluid*
=
                            ----- Original Message ----- 
                 =
           From: THECODE 
                            To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
                            Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
      =
                      Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                           =
 Train Wreck walked away from the battle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away=
. Stranato, not seeing any point in continuing the battle, ran off with the=
m. Scamrock followed with a grunt from being outnumbered. Artist laughed an=
d ran after them as well.

                            "Know what my names =
gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Scamrock said.

                   =
         "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out to g=
rab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

                          =
  "We left that idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said=
.

                            "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

                 =
           "It's my base, and Arrow is welcome to be repaired there and so =
are the other former Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

                        =
    The Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out something that=
 none of them, could understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. The=
 People's Base's secret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

              =
              "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

                =
            "What about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

                      =
      "Never mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the =
water and ushered him to come along while he walked with his comrades.

   =
                         Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gangon.

 =
                           "Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBl=
ade will still show up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona f=
lew away.

                            "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meee=
ee!" Gangon screamed.

                            Dracona didn't hear and =
landed next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona=
, and Artist all entered the Poeple's base through the secret passage way, =
the computer reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbomber stepped =
into a door.

                            "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It'=
s amazing!" Train Wreck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all h=
ealed up.

                            "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cig=
ars in here, too! and it's big enough to put a table in to play cards! How =
come we never noticed this room before?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked in=
to the room. Stronghold and Blender followed.

                            =
"Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room. Plintissa sealed t=
he door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were locked =
inside the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of banging, but =
it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and sat=
 down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

                            "=
Oh, man! Not even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" =
Stronghold said.

                            "What are we going to do? Not=
hing to smoke!" Blender said.

                            "I have more nee=
ds than all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and need to exercis=
e!" Stranato yelled.

                            "How come we can't all ge=
t along! I don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at h=
im like he was going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.

           =
                 "You see? That's why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up a=
gainst Stranato and his stupid rules! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelle=
d.

                            "Yeah, and nobody is getting out of here un=
til we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

                           =
 Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood up again, and started pacing=
 the room. Stronghold and Blender started to look in cracks in the wall for=
 something to drink, despite plenty of water in this room. Train Wreck was =
discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and Stronghold and Blender j=
oined them before long.

                            "Say, you guys, it's r=
eally lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

                     =
       "Shut up and get your ass over here! Of course you can join us!" Arr=
ow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits with them. Stro=
nghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.

                            Plin=
tissa and Dracona smile to each other and walk up and out of the secret pas=
sgeway, taking a walk across a field...
